title: Managing Your Money:  ETFs for a Rising Rate Environment
description: Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster speaks with Todd Rosenbluth, head of research at ETF Trends and ETF Database, about the future of active ETFs and ETFs to consider in an environment with rising rates and inflation.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster speaks with Todd Rosenbluth, head of research at ETF Trends and ETF Database, about the future of active ETFs and ETFs to consider in an environment with rising rates and inflation.
